summary: Build a member image gallery where logged-in users can upload, view, and delete their own images.

existing_features.title: Frontend: Provide a gallery page that lists gallery media items and allows authenticated members to upload new media (image or video) with optional title and description.
Frontend: Allow members to delete their own uploaded gallery media items from both the gallery grid and the lightbox view, with a confirmation dialog and clear success/error feedback.

Frontend/Backend integration: Ensure the gallery list and delete/upload mutations are wired through React Query so the gallery view remains consistent after changes (upload/delete) and handles actor availability/authentication transitions gracefully.

new_feature_requests.summary: Member image gallery: logged-in users can upload, view, and delete their own images
Backend: Ensure authenticated members can add gallery media items (image or video) with optional title/description, and store the item's author so ownership can be enforced later.
Backend: Enforce deletion permissions so that only the original author of a gallery media item (or an admin) can delete it.
